Question: KingSmith Fitness CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KingSmith Fitness CES 2024

- WalkingPad's R and X series treadmills with maximum speeds of 9 to 11 miles per hour
- Compact design with foldable handrails
- Patented and unrivaled compact folding style
- LifeSmart Ampera under-desk bike made of recycled materials
- Charges devices using energy generated from pedaling
- Yoga ball office chair for use with under-desk treadmills
- Snailcle S1 exercise bike with integrated AI technology
- Snailcle M1 rowing machine with compact storage and free training app
- Snailcle R1 recumbent bike with retracting base and free training app
